name: Ansible
description: Ansible is an open-source software provisioning, configuration management, and application-deployment tool. It runs on many Unix-like systems, and can configure both Unix-like systems as well as Microsoft Windows. It is agentless, connecting via SSH or WinRM.
benefits: Idempotent operations (running multiple times has same effect)
usage_notes: Relies on SSH for Linux/Unix and WinRM for Windows.
Modules provide specific functionalities (e.g., managing packages, services, files).
